about: Hi, I’m Shaswat, a passionate and versatile Full-Stack Developer dedicated to crafting dynamic, scalable, and user-focused web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I specialize in building seamless digital experiences using modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and Express, coupled with robust database solutions like MongoDB and MySQL.I thrive on solving complex problems and transforming ideas into functional, elegant code. Whether it’s creating intuitive user interfaces, optimizing server-side performance, or designing APIs, I bring a detail-oriented and innovative approach to every project.Feel free to explore my projects to see how I bring concepts to life. Let’s connect and collaborate to create something exceptional!
